metadata.synopsis: With the help of his kindly neighbor, Mr. Percy (Paul Soles), Peter (Kristopher Lemche), an average teenager, wins a free trip to a medieval castle. But, when Peter arrives for a photo opportunity, he is magically transported to the 14th century, where the insidious Lord Raykin (Marc Robinson) has just seized the throne. In his struggle to return home, Peter must find the good wizard, Perceval (also Soles), and face down Raykin and his evil sorcerer, Eriuk (Claudiu Trandafir).
